game.title: The Enchanted Journey
game.description: Embark on a quest to restore balance in the mystical realm by retrieving the fabled Soulstone. Encounter treacherous forests, mystical beings, and ancient riddles as you journey. The stone is believed to be hidden within the heart of an enchanted castle guarded by a wise sage.

task.objective: Discover the entrance to the Enchanted Castle
task.description: Talk to the village elder in Elysian Vale for guidance on how to find the hidden entrance. The castle's secrets lie within the ancient map hidden among the old oak trees.

The first challenge is to gain access to the castle's inner chambers. A guardian beast is under a curse that affects its ability to guard the entrance. Help Elara by crafting an antidote using her unique knowledge of plants.

task.objective: Solve the Enchanted Puzzle of the Three Guardians
task.description: The castle's three guardian statues will reveal a riddle to unlock the next chamber. Use your intelligence and observation skills to interpret their message.

task.objective: Defeat the Guardian Mage in the Crystal Caverns
task.description: The final challenge awaits within the depths of the castle's crystal caverns. Face the powerful mage who guards the Soulstone and demonstrate your mastery of elemental magic to claim it.
task.location: Crystal Caverns of the Guardian Mage
